item.title: Make all items unsellable to shops (delta)
item.dc:creator: @Aesyr Aesyr
item.description:
@Aesyr wrote:

phatzpvp1:

How? I think it may have something to do with shops.cfg…

I don’t remember where, but there are 2 numbers before all the items, and after the shop ID. I believe you can set both of these to zero, and you’ll not be able to sell items to that shop. If you want to do this for all shops, simply apply it to all of them. It’s 0, 1, or 2. Nothing higher.

I’d like to warn you, although, this will cause a horrible decline in your server’s economy unless you have some other brilliant plan to counter that fact worked up.

EDIT: You may be miswording your question, although.

Read full topic
